body:
@jhseu If the string given is 'default', the default NameNode configuration will be used (from the [XML configuration files](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/files/827165/hadoop-conf.zip) (default location: ${HADOOP_PREFIX}/etc/hadoop))

I have tested on our Hadoop cluster and can [work with TensorFlowOnSpark](https://github.com/yahoo/TensorFlowOnSpark/pull/45).

More seen:
https://github.com/apache/hadoop/blob/release-2.7.1/hadoop-hdfs-project/hadoop-hdfs/src/main/native/libhdfs/hdfs.h#L259
